author: vamsic007
msg: GERONIMO-2283 Common libs portlet guesses wrong group ID, gives no usage advice
o Updated the javascript to use RegularExpression processing on the filename to come up with artifact, version and type suggestion.
o Updated the code to suggest groupId if the file path is in a Maven1 or Maven2 repository structure.

author: brett
msg: [MNG-2228] only add JARs that are resolved to the classloader. This avoids a problem in it0094, where wagon-ssh-external is declared as an extension but is excluded due to being in the Maven core.

author: tellison
msg: Apply patch HARMONY-2936 ([classlib][luni]InetAddress.getByName does not support some textual representations)
